data.name: Takeout food
data.detailed_description:
This is a text type GALGAME game

The long summer vacation has begun. In order to exercise myself, I choose to take part-time delivery, experience life, and earn some pocket money.
When I was working, I was running around with food. Doors open and close. Meeting every day, talking in a few words, stranges also became friends. After sharing some wonderful things together, I also have different emotions with them...
The proprietress of Fengyun Tangbao Restaurant was gentle and virtuous, and her cooking was very good. A pair of skillful hands could always make unbelievable delicacies. After knowing about my work, she gave me a lot of help. Her husband was working outside home all the year round, and it was inevitable that she feels lonely. I thought that maybe I go with her more, she would not be so lonesome...
In a training class where I often go to take-away, there was a kind girl. Her name was Yang Yuling, patient and meticulous, her smile was sweet and she was fair-skinnned. Every time she took food from my hands, I always worried that the belt would hurt her hand.
And Jenny, a blond foreign girl, her passion was unrestrained, sometimes I couldn't help it...
I am very grateful for my work which let me know so many lovely people . It makes me look forward to life in the future.

data.short_description: As a handsome male college student, he took part in the summer vacation to give away the takeaway, but opened the door to the new world. Beautiful and lonely women, professional women, restaurant owners, beautiful students.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: i3 7100
  • Memory: 4056 MB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 730
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Blaster Z

Prudent purchase
